name: Veteran

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally SPD in Dungeons by 1

skills.name: Disarm
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Has a 35% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns. Damage inflicted is proportional to DEF.
Damage based on: [DEF]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +15%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Head Hunter
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Places a 30% [Increase C. RATE] buff on all allies for 3 turns if the target is killed. Damage inflicted is proportional to DEF.
Damage based on: [DEF] [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%
Lvl. 6 Damage +15%

skills.name: Massacre
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of placing a [Block Buffs] debuff for 1 turn. Damage increases according to this Champion's MAX HP.
Damage based on: [DEF] [HP]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1
